"In a nutshell, here's the lowdown.": "Finish this test and you'll have permission to join the new Gunner class."
"The Gunner class was added because ARKS keeps on growing and we need to further differentiate our roles."
"Gunners are similar to Rangers, and they're not a new concept. In fact, Gunners were once in wide use until ARKS membership started to dwindle."
"As for the details on Gunner class abilities, you should probably just see for yourself after the test."
